EmailTemplate.description: Email to customer letting them know they're on a waitlist
EmailTemplate.name: CA - Assigned to Waitlist
EmailTemplate.subject: You're on the waitlist for a BlueWave Community Solar share
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey BlueWaver,
Welcome, we're happy you're here!
Right now, all of our Community Solar projects are fully subscribed, but as soon as a spot opens up, we'll be sure to let you know so that you can join your friends and neighbors in enjoying solar savings!
While you wait to be assigned to a farm, we'll check in periodically to keep you up to speed on all things Community Solar and BlueWave.
For right now we want to say thank you, and we're looking forward to a bright future ahead!
Thanks for joining the Wave. - All of us here at BlueWave
Questions? 844.768.4100 | customercare@bluewavesolar.com
